description: Try our easy to follow Salmon Kokoda recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ceviche,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Easter,Dairy free,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Salmon Kokoda Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt little gem lettuce combo (leaves separated)

recipeInstructions.text: Place salmon into a ceramic or glass bowl. Pour over lime juice and toss to coat. Set aside for 10 minutes. The fish turns opaque and pale pink when cured.
Add 2 tbs coconut cream to salmon mixture and toss to coat. Drain juices from salmon and stir into remaining coconut cream.
Arrange lettuce on a platter and top with salmon, tomato, capsicum, chilli and coriander.
Serve with remaining coconut cream and lime wedges.
